0603226.summary: This chapter provides an introduction to one-way quantum computation, including techniques such as stabilizer formalism and logical Heisenberg picture. The authors also review current proposals for implementations and experimental progress.
0603226.keywords: One-way quantum computation, Stabilizer formalism, Logical Heisenberg picture

2307.08956.summary: This tutorial aims to introduce the basics of Haar measure tools in quantum information, providing a gentle introduction to representation theory for beginners. It covers key concepts such as moment operators, symmetric subspaces, and unitary designs.
2307.08956.keywords: Haar measure, quantum information, linear algebra, representation theory, unitary designs
